alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:40PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Duval, southeastern Webb and southern Jim Wells Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 539 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Freer to near Las Lomitas to 9 miles southeast of Ramirez. Movement was southwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Freer, Concepcion, Realitos, Mirando City, Bruni, Cruz Calle, Oilton, Ramirez, Aguilares and Ranchitos Las Lomas. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 766 and 812. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
